casebody.data:
Travis Clinton HITTSON, petitioner,
v.
Bruce CHATMAN, Warden. No. 15-8157 (15A857). Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 17, 2016.

The application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice THOMAS and by him referred to the Court is denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Georgia denied.
